attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Competition is crucial to the workings of an economy.  A free market system guarantees an optimal output subject to adjusting for externalities.  The monarchy sector of the British economy is worth approximately £37M per year.  We demand that the Prime Minister should allow more monarchs to enter the market and allow the added competition to improve efficiency in the market.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
